          <title>
            <string language="en">Waves and particles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellen und Partikel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vagues et particules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas e partículas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde e particelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύματα και μόρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas y partículas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration describes the two ways of representing electromagnetic radiation, either as a wave (left) or as a particle (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Frequency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Particle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">photons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung beschreibt die zwei Methoden des 
Darstellens der elektromagnetischen Strahlung, entweder als Welle 
(nach links) oder als Partikel (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration décrit les deux voies de 
représenter le rayonnement électromagnétique, comme vague (à 
gauche) ou comme particule (droite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração descreve as duas maneiras de 
representar a radiação eletromagnética, como uma onda (à esquerda)
ou como uma partícula (direita).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione descrive i due modi di 
rappresentare la radiazione elettromagnetica, come onda (a sinistra) o
come particella (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση περιγράφει τους δύο τρόπους την 
ηλεκτρομαγνητική ακτινοβολία, είτε ως κύμα (αριστερά) είτε ως 
μόριο (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración describe las dos maneras de 
representar la radiación electromágnetica, como onda (a la 
izquierda) o como partícula (derecha).</string>
          </description>
